featured.text: The ancient civilizations would not be so deeply admired today if these ancient artifacts were not so widely available to an international public in major museums throughout Europe and America.

Following increasing calls for the return of artistic objects that were removed decades or centuries ago, some of the world’s leading museums have signed a declaration that they will not hand back the ancient artifacts to their countries of origin.

definition.zh_def: 人類製作的物品，通常具有文化或歷史意義。
definition.en_def: An object made by a human being, typically an item of cultural or historical interest.
definition.example: The museum displayed an ancient artifact from the Roman Empire.
